name: 葛如鈞
objective:
本課程旨在透過案例分享討論，歸納企劃的核心精神，協助學生從一般設計領域，跨入到充滿各式 App 的當代應用生活設計。本課程探討之 APP 乃 Application 之縮寫，宏觀可以是無任何程式碼的生活應用或商務應用，微觀可以是手機、手錶、眼鏡或是 VR 頭盔裡的軟體應用。

本課程也著重應用內涵的創新與創造，與其教導寫出騙人的厚厚企劃書，還不如教導抓住成功企劃（Plan）的要素。本課程預計有部分會以分組討論、簡報等動態滾動方式進行體驗教學，期能教導學生開展出具有創性並可以推展的應用企劃。

This course is designed to help students move from the general field of design to one that is full of different types of projects through case studies and discussions. The contemporary application of App in lifestyle design. This course explores the APP which is the abbreviation of Application, which can be a macro life without any code. Applications or business applications, the microscopic can be mobile phones, watches, glasses, or software applications in VR headsets.

This course also focuses on innovation and creativity in application content. Instead of writing deceptively thick plans, it is better to teach how to catch successful plans. It is expected that some parts of this course will be conducted in a dynamic and rolling manner, such as group discussions and presentations, in order to teach students to develop the elements of Plan. In this course, some of the experiential teaching will be conducted in a dynamic and rolling way, such as group discussions and presentations, in order to teach students to develop the skills and knowledge necessary for the development of their own plans. Innovative and scalable applications.
